About Me

Bio


Hi there, I’m Denieall. I’m a fresh graduate, seeking to increase my knowledge, explore new technologies and eager to offer my expertise whenever needed. In my spare time, I usually participate in online courses such as Udemy so that I would never stop learning. During my internship at BizAid Technologies, I have built a specialized web browser using C# to fill up forms and submit them automatically using data from SQL Server with iMacros .NET Component for big clients like UEM and Khazanah.
